title: App Store Connect Approval ✅
summary: TrendFit is approved for release. External TestFlight beta is next.
body: Great news — **TrendFit** has been approved in App Store Connect.
• We’re opening **external TestFlight** for Founding Members first.
• Watch your inbox for a TestFlight invite (from Apple).
• Install the **TestFlight** app and accept the invite to join the beta.
• Share bugs & ideas via our **Beta Feedback** page (Founding Members only).

title: Project Update: Beta focus for 2025
body: We’re focusing the initial public beta on TrendFit and TrendFitStack to keep things fast, simple, and stable.
TrendFitChallenge is deferred until after we ship a solid first beta and collect feedback.
Apple requires a one-time external TestFlight review for the first public beta build.

title: Feature Spotlight: TrendFitStack
body: Compare a single trend (like Active Energy) across multiple workout types—Running, Walking, Hiking, and more.
Flip between daily, weekly, monthly, and annual views, and stack totals to see the bigger picture.

title: Privacy Policy Published
body: TrendFit reads Apple HealthKit data on-device and does not upload your health data to servers.
You can review the full policy any time on our site.

title: Founding Member Program
body: Founding Member signups are open now and will close in the coming months.
Join early to follow progress and help shape the direction of TrendFit.
